name: Debbie Heckler
text: Albany Bistro is the favorite destination for our girls' day out lunches!   The staff is accommodating, efficient and friendly.    Great prices, too!    Today, our group had the snapper with rice and asparagus, the Bistro burger, and the meatloaf plate.  We were all raving that ours was the best choice!   (And we were all right!)

name: Kelli Lovelace
text: This is no longer Albany Bistro. A wonderful new breakfast café has opened. Whisked. They open very early and are open every day. The food is delicious and the options are varied... everything from a light breakfast to an over flowing omelet.

name: Julianne Hansen
text: I have visited this establishment many MANY times and have NEVER been disappointed in the service or the food!  It's a lovely place with an outstanding menu.  Compliments to the chef are given each and every time I experience Albany Bistro!

name: Sam Grey
text: Service is great and not overly attentive.  Fried oysters were outstanding, as was the beef tenderloin.  Love this place.

name: Celieboo
text:
Great menu. Intimate setting. Friendly staff. Lunch prices are more affordable than dinner, but the food is quality!
I went for lunch and enjoyed it so much tha I went back fo dinner.

name: Blake Singleton
text: I've eaten here twice. Both times the food has been excellent. If the prices were a little lower (not much, two people can comfortably eat here for less than $100), it'd be a 5 star rating.

name: Gail Blenis
text: Such a quaint little place. We loved the atmosphere and the food was delicious.  Try the fried chicken....so good!!!

name: Jeremy Bowling
text: Excellent lunch experience. I really enjoyed the food and thought it was reasonably priced. The Blueberry Cheesecake for dessert was perfection!

name: Brandon Patterson
text: Great service and the food is simply amazing. Thank you Albany Bistro for the great experience.

name: Kristin T
text: Love this place! Such yummy food and the people here are fantastic! It's our favorite restaurant!

name: Chris Latham
text: Hands down the best restaurant in the Tennessee Valley. Great service, amazing food, and lovely atmosphere.

name: Josh
text: This is a great spot to relax and enjoy a finely crafted sandwich from the many choices while enjoying a great view outside.

name: TJ Brakefield
text:
Chef Jacob knows great food. Located approx. .3 miles off the main strip it's a very interesting environment paired with wonderfully prepared and plated dishes. I highly recommend the beef stroganoff, provided it does not rotate off the menu.
P.s. don't rotate the beef stroganoff.

name: Carolyn Binger
text: Absolutely delicious! Best meatloaf I have ever had

name: Keith Morgan
text: Food was excellent. We will be back. Make a reservation they are busy.

name: Lindsey Faulkner
text: Exquisite food, atmosphere,  and service!

name: Christina Simmons
text: My friend and I decided to try this restaurant out for lunch one day.  When we arrived the lady taking our order told us they were out of basically half the menu and the menu is not very big to begin with.  I ordered a chicken salad sandwich and mashed potatoes, they were extremely plain tasting, not enough seasoning...But edible.  My friend ordered a salad which she paid $8.99 for, and all she got was a small bowl of lettuce, a little bit of chicken, some crutons, and some dressing.  I felt really bad for her, because when she was finished she was still very hungry, but didn't have time to go anywhere else and get anything before going back to work.  Maybe this place needs to call Chef Ramsey from Kitchen Nightmares to help them out, haha.

resp.text: Christina we would definately like to have the chance to prove that our food is above ordinary.  Because we are an independent, chef-owned business, we take great pride in bringing the freshest, highest quality products to the table.  There are times that we choose to let our inventory run low...usually before holidays or times when we know we will be closed for an extended period of time. It's not that we are ill-prepared, instead we try to bring only the best to the table.  We sincerely apologize for the "nightmare" you & your guests experienced here.  We hope you will give us a chance to show you a truly great lunch.

name: Shenon Williams
text: I wish i could give this place zero stars!!!!  My cousin rented out the place for his wedding reception they bragged on how this is their favorite place. They must not have recieved such harsh service as i did. There was a server assigned to our table she was a delight. But for some reason another very rude disrespectful server kept approaching me. I felt as if i was in high school and she was a bully. She was very aggressive towards me for no reason and kept coming to our table to address me as uf she wanted to start a arguement. She damn near snatched my glass of water away from me and continued to harrass me throughout the night. Now it was obvious to everyone at the table she was a bully. The crazy thing about this whole situation is that SHE WASNT EVEN MY SERVER!!!!  there was no reason for her to come to our table in the first place and the fact she continued to come back and harass me was. Crazy.   When i told the manager about this server he chumped me off as if i was just complaining to complain. I am a bartender so i know all about customer service. And This place is the worst. I hope they stay closed so no one else has to endure what i went through. I am soooooooo pissed. I wish thetevwas more i could do to keep this place closed. I have never been so disrespected in my life.

name: Christian Smith
text: Great atmosphere, and even better food. A Decatur favorite.

name: Drew Williams
text: Awesome place. A hidden gem of Decatur

name: Phil Ryu
text: Great food and kind servers

name: Jimmy Ray Smith
text: Such a nice restaurant

name: Gay Campbell
text: Sorry to hear it closed

name: Jennifer Fritschi
text: This was a hidden gem. The food changes daily and they only use fresh, local ingredients. It's southern meat n 3 with a modern flair. I had the most amazing cornbread with peach butter made from Alabama's Chilton County peaches. Most meat n 3's I've been too, the food it overcooked and bland. At Relish Cafe, the food is so well seasoned and flavorful. I wish it was a meat n 6 because it was hard to pick just 3 of the amazing looking sides. Their fried green tomatoes were the best I've ever tasted.

name: Jamie White
text: I have eaten at Relish Cafe many times and never have I been disappointed. The food is always fresh and the portions are more than adequate. I would recommend this cafe to anyone who enjoys a good meal at a reasonable price.

name: The Traveling Family
text: Great food.. I got the catfish (came with 2 pieces) with mac &cheese and broccoli casserole and it was great.

name: Greg Pennington
text: Wonderful home cooking and we need to support them because they are a little hard to find

name: Noah Morgan
text: Good experience

name: Susan mcgriff
text: It's a cooking class

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text:
Yard Birds Chicken Company keeps getting better and better. They changed the menu yesterday and added cheese grits and bottomless Chicken & waffles everyday! I love chicken and waffles, but the portion was big enough that I could only eat one waffle, crispy fried breast and wing. To the owner you are a man of your word when you said you would fix the problems. We have been back a 4th and 5th time and every thing was fantastic!

2nd visit maybe I just have bad luck, Stood at the door for several minutes with my wife. They were not busy and we even asked an employee if we could just sit. Someone will be with you. I want to like this place but....... a simple hey we see you would help. I would actually rate it lower but the fried chicken is good and that got them an extra star. 1st visit Ate lunch at Yard Birds Chicken Company. Today was the grand opening so I will forgive them for forgetting the jalapeño cornbread then giving me biscuits and having to ask for ranch multiple times. The chicken was excellent, They use a crumbly crust almost like you use on fried green tomatoes. And It almost seems like they smoke the chicken first then batter and fry. It was tasty and next time I will have to have the hot. Now for the bad the corn bread was cold, not just room temp but cold. If it was warm then man it would have been great. As a suggestion please please add a honey butter with the warm cornbread or biscuits and it would be perfection.

name: Chastity Webb
text: Went on a Tuesday around lunch. It wasn’t busy as there were only about 4 other tables. Waitress was nice but service was slow. Menu advertises steak fries, we received potato wedges. Not sure is that is a typo on the menu or a stock issue as their collard greens were also out of stock that day. Wouldn’t care to visit again.

name: Justin Williams
text: Went Friday night, the place had a nice crowd. Sat at the bar and ordered right away. Bartender was very nice and talkative. Food was great! Need to cook the potato wedges just a hair longer though. Will definitely be back to try the wings another day.

name: Nick Pearson
text: Best Chicken you can get in Trussville. I have eaten in twice and done Take-Out twice. Never had a bad experience and food always tastes amazing. The portions are huge and prices are just right! If you haven't tried it yet I suggest you do so!

name: Linsey Honeycutt
text: My husband and I went to Yard Birds today to try the "bottomless chicken and waffles " It was delicious! The service was great and The chicken was freshly fried and hot when delivered. He ordered the original waffle. I ordered the chocolate chip waffle. Huge portions! No way we could do seconds! We had get a to go box for our first round!! We also ordered a bourbon pecan pie to go. We have not tried it yet, but it's beautiful in its box and smells amazing! We will be back!!!

name: Katy Gibson
text: Stopped in for the weekend brunch of ENDLESS chicken n waffles ($10 each), So good! The staff was friendly and helpful. Try it you'll love it. Plus the restaurant donates a part of their profits to military and first responders.

name: Peggy Cox
text: We visited the new Yard Birds Chicken in Trussville last evening. Very nice experience. Very clean, very friendly and very good food. Prices are reasonable and service is excellent. A nice, relaxing dinner. Absolutely the best Mac and cheese I've ever had!

name: Joanna Nicholas
text: We decided to try this place again a few nights ago. I got the bourbon Sriracha popcorn chicken. It was amazing and there was more than enough for leftovers. I ate it again the next day and it was even better. We ate there again today & it was wonderful again. Service was nice and quick. I'm so glad this place worked out it's growing pains & had turned into a decent place to have lunch or dinner.

name: K Mixon
text: It was just okay.  I got the smoked chicken and it had no flavor.  The grits were extremely runny and the collard greens were not good.  The macaroni and cheese had an unique taste that my daughter did not like.  I would have given this place one star but the severs were so nice and extremely helpful.

name: Anthony Riley
text: The food was great, it deserves five stars. The service was ok, it did take a little while for our order but it wasn't too long. The only drawback for me were the prices which I thought were a little high. I will have to try here again in the near future, the food was worth the trip.

name: Mary Libb
text: Just had the best fried chicken, fried green tomatoes and homemade pimento cheese at Yardbirds. The atmosphere, servers and music were also great. Will definitely be back soon!!

name: Lauren Washington
text: First time here, service started out a little slow, but our server Alexis made up for that, she was very friendly and provided great service. I really would like to give this place 3.5 starts just because it's not quite 4. Chicken was fried well, and breast was juicy and not dry, the crust had great flavor but the meat itself didn't have much flavor, chicken should be marinated or brined to give the meat some flavor. Whole fried okra was very good. Macaroni cheese was soupy with hardly any cheese flavor, they should revamp that recipe, collard greens were like they had been sitting all day they were over cooked. My family liked the waffles. I would give it another try to try some of the other sides. I think with a few changes this place would be a go to place.

name: Halen Talley
text: Very good. I think this would be a good place to come on a Football Saturday.

name: Neal Morrow
text: Chicken was cold and tasteless. Mac and cheese was not good but did enjoy the fried green tomatoes. Also, they forgot the cornbread/buscuit.

name: Landon K
text: I had mac & cheese, fruit bowl, and 8 pc wings. It was all really good and the wings are really big.

name: Tonja Johnson
text: It was 15.00 for a small cup of Mac & Cheese, 4 small potatoe wedges and popcorn chicken. The popcorn chicken was mostly crumbs, all of the food was overcooked, and cold. Will not return

name: katie woodall
text: Great food and service!!!! We will be back for.  Chicken and waffles

name: Corey Morris
text: Came in the afternoon and no one here and still has taken them 20 + mins to bring my wings. They were no servers in sight when we entered it took at least 5 mins before they came out from the back

name: cporourke
text: Great food! Better service!

name: Neoami S
text: I did not like this place.  Chicken was done and tasted ok.  Sides (macaroni and potato salad) were the worst I've ever eaten. Cornbread was hard and horrible.  Will not be back.

name: Terrell Glass
text: Great chicken. It's a little expensive but it's worth it!

name: Nick Jaurigue
text:
The service has been good so far. I'm in love with their breakfast selections and the milkshakes. The biscuits are made fresh right there in the store. My only coming I have is the amount of salt they use on the fries. The seasoning is a lot and if they cut back a little they would be so much better.
My only wish was they opened a little earlier for the workers who start their day way before the sun comes up.

resp.text: Thank you for coming out to see us, Nick! We appreciate the feedback and will share it with our team. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Ruben Lloyd
text: Poor customer service. Food was cold. Pulled up for lunch the breakfast menu was still up. There was no way to really know what I wanted. No help was given. Placed my order and it was incorrect and cold. Cold as in it was like it had been sitting there for extended period of time. Management should really look into this. The restaurant hasn't been open 6 months; and this is ridiculous for a new restaurant.

name: James Smith
text: It was good food for the price. The help was very friendly and they thanked you for coming to see them. That's what I look for when I go some where's to eat or to buy something.

name: Cheryl
text: So happy that this restaurant is close enough to us for a Saturday morning drive. The cashier was very friendly, place was clean and the food was delicious.

name: Cody Taylor
text: Honestly the best chicken and milkshakes in the area. They have a nice menu with a lot of options and the interior decorating is nice as well. I'd probably give it a 4.5 but since that isn't available I'll give it a 5 :)

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and review, Cody! We look forward to serving you again soon.

name: Michael Hoffman
text: I've been here several times since they opened, and the quality and service has been consistently good.

name: Scott Mininger
text: First time here was soon after it opened and the drive thru was VERY long but went inside and received great service and good food in short order! Second time here was the opposite experience. Not many people in line inside or out  and we waited a full 45 minutes to order and get our food! It was the slowest fast food I've ever seen! Several of the workers seemed clueless what was going on and just stood around doing nothing. Food was still good but not worth it for waiting so long.

name: Jennifer Walker
text: Food is very good, but there has been a few times I order 1 thing and got something else, they really need to watch what they are bagging up.

name: Jonathan Johnson
text: Nice and clean delicious food would like to be able to refill my own drinks fast service

name: Dalton
text: Ordered a CHEESE BURGER, and asked for it plain, then got charged $1.00 for "extra cheese" when it was litterly just a regular cheese burger, ordered a "Large" combo, TWICE, and neither time was it a large. Their food is tiny, and doesn't have that southern taste by any means, it taste like it's from Indiana, gross! Unpolite employees, slow service, and just not worth it. Do not recommend at all! Would do 0/5 stars if I could. Will give their breakfast a try, but not even gonna bother updating my review if it is just as bad.

resp.text: Dalton, we are so sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your experience with us. We sincerely hope your breakfast visit goes better. Please share your concerns anytime with our team at tellittojacks.smg.com.

name: Carrie Fields
text: It's the newest fast food in our area so it's the best

name: Missie Tschida
text: Not one person there was happy, smiled, or was friendly. We were there at 3:30 pm for a late lunch. We both ordered a burger of some sort, fries, and a shake. No one was in line before us when we got there, and the drive through was just a couple cars. It took forever. Neither of us thought it was anything to write home about, except the lemon shake. Won't go back.

name: Dana Cooley
text: The food is great as well as the prices. The lemonade shake is so good! Will definitely be back.

name: Stikbot Vlogs
text:
Drive through line can be long as hell but awesome food in my opinion.

I also like that lemon shake.

name: Earl Tarbes
text: We received good service counter person was nice and polite food was great did not take long at all was satisfied with the food and service will go back

resp.text: Thank you for coming to dine with us, Earl! We hope to see you back again soon.

name: John Evarts
text: Waited to just order in drive thru for 25 mins. behind 5 cars. Also saw four workers outside roaming around smoking.Total time to get food was 40 mins. I also like to ask the owner why he doesn't take care of all these issues? Instead of telling people to go on Jacks page.

name: A G
text:
Food was ok...burger good. Fries too salty n very small low quality fry chips.
My service on my second visit was horrible.

Order was wrong in front of me. Stood 10 minutes before that was settled.  Barely an apology or acknowledgement.  My order was taken voided and training taken place by manager for remainder of my order.   Cashier became friendly and apologetic after help entering order.  Manager attitude was horrible.  Did not acknowledge  the delaysssss, her training session and was very dry n rude which i returned back to her.

I understand they are busy and overworkd and under staffed.  But polite professional common sense is a basic need for any workforce.

Jack you need more secret shoppers to report these problems back if you want people to come back!!!!  I won't be back for a while.

name: Roger Leek
text: This place is obviously fairly new, so it is hard to understand how it could be so dirty inside already. Everywhere you look there's dirty trays, balled up napkins and the floor is slippery with grease. The bathroom was terribly dirty. It is obvious there's no emphasis on cleanliness at this establishment. Oh, and the chicken fingers were cold.

name: Ashley Price
text: Ive gone 3 times and every time my order is messed up. Past 2 times they just forgot my fries so i let it slide because they were busy and Ive worked food service so im pretty understanding. Today i ordered 2 kids meals and 2 meals for my boyfriend & myself. Kids did not get their lemonade and instead of Dr pepper i ordered i got unsweet tea. Food itself is pretty good but Ive now 3 times paid for items i didnt receive so i wont be back.

name: Norman Phair
text: I remember the first time I ate at Jack's 1976 right outside of Anniston Alabama I think I was 13 oh, the first time I went to the one in Atmore chicken sandwiches were hot delicious fries were hot and delicious the second time I went in Atmore the chicken sandwich or cold french fries were okay the third time I went the chicken sandwiches were cold and the French fries taste like they were cooked in old grease, other than that the milkshakes are great I wish I could have a better review but you know y'all ask me how it was and I told you

resp.text: Norman, we are sorry to hear you didn't enjoy your recent visit with us. Please share the details with our team at tellittojacks.smg.com so we can look into what's going on.

name: April Felishai Willis
text: Food always fresh. So far....so good

name: The Maestro Knows
text: Very friendly staff. Good food. Always hot.

name: H. Findley
text: I've ate here 3 times so far; once via the drive thru and twice inside.  2 times was breakfast dnd once was lunch.  All 3 times the food was great, the staff was friendly and made my service feel welcomed.  That is something that's starting to lack in other fastfood restaurants here in Atmore. Not all, but some.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to dine with us and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to serving you again soon.

name: Jason Koehn
text: A little slow on getting the order for 6 completely around.  Had to wait awhile on a couple of drinks. Food was ok.

name: Gayle Farrington-Helms
text: In the two weeks the Atmore location has been open I've been twice.  Both times they screwed up my order.  Chicken isn't bad,  fries are good,  slaw is meh

name: Naphtalimara 7
text: 1st time visiting this place. Got home and discovered no tomatoes on my jack burger. And had a milkshake /block of ice cream in my cup. Wasn't mixed well at all.. I wont be coming back.

resp.text: We sincerely apologize that this happened. Please share the details with our team at tellittojacks.smg.com so we can address them with our staff.

name: Julianna Bell
text: Slow and rude.. waited 20 minutes while watching there employees walk past the front counter like they didnt see me and my man standing there ready to order.  No one was in front of us.. its unorganized and bad quality for the cost you pay for the food its tiny, and employees dont listen to your order.  For a company that JUST opened we r disappointed by the way everyone handled there tasks if you weren't ready for customers you shouldn't have opened your doors.

resp.text: Julianna, we are sad to hear this was your experience. Please let our team know the details of what happened at tellittojacks.smg.com and we'll look into this.

name: A
text: Delicious food, fast service. Far and away the best fast food restaurant in Atmore.

name: Eve Pearson
text: 2 hour wait for fast food 🙄🤦🏽‍♀️ I would’ve left if I was the one driving !! Definitely not impressed the country fried chicken sandwich is literally just chicken on a bun nothing else on it !! Never again over priced & over rated 🤷🏽‍♀️

resp.text: Eve, we are sorry to hear this. Please share your experience with our team at tellittojacks.smg.com so we can address these concerns.

name: Linda salzer
text: Nice place,good food and service,has a nice variety as well

name: Star Power
text: food is terrible. chicken sandwich had ZERO condiments no mayo nothing. and I waited in line for that one combo for 45 mins. asked for salt and pepper and ketchup for the fries . guess what. none in the bag. and I wasn’t getting back in line to wait another hour.

resp.text: We sincerely apologize for the long wait and for the mistakes. Please let our team know what happened at tellittojacks.smg.com so we can look into this further.

name: Luna Wolfe
text: Not worth it.  Dont waste your money here rude employees

name: Tiffanyandkevin Crabtree
text: A little busy but great food

name: Deanna Johnson
text: Bathrooms were nasty and out of toilet paper, customer service was horrible, gave me 10 fries in my medium container and 11 in his large...burger was barely warm tenders dry, only good thing was the Mac and cheese

name: Kim Daniel
text: Great Place !!! They Have the best food in Atmore..

name: Austin Boutwell
text: Good food but over priced and long wait. VERY SMALL PORTION SIZES.

name: Kait Nightingale
text: Don't come here on the 4th of July

name: Alabama Bassin!!!
text: Ate here with my family and it was bad. Tiny tiny chicken tenders. Supposedly hand breaded chicken sandwich, was a frozen patty. Just bad....

name: Sharon Robinson
text: The wait for drive thru was long and order wasn't right

name: Random Guy On YouTube
text: Dude, the people here are so rude to the customer. Never getting my service again.

name: Ray Jacobson
text:
Alright but still can't get orders right...
Didn't give me 1 sandwich and then made 2 wrong.
Staff is 50/50 with attitude or forced niceness.
So 2 off for them
Might try again some day

name: Vanessa Kyser
text: Jack's was very good 👍 👌

name: David Hester
text: Wait a little long because everyone wants to eat there.

name: Gia Singleton
text: Me and my family went here to eat, and all we got was attitude after attitude, poorly made food!!

name: Luis Garcia
text: Great place for burgers

name: Haley Shaw
text: Friendly service

name: Tarnisha Russell
text: Good service

name: bonnie bazemore-mason
text: Fox news a downer!

name: Adam Smith
text: Really bad service 😒

name: Alpha Wolfe
text: Never again, NEVER!

name: Randy Reeves
text: Nice place and food good - only problem is they don't clean tables after customers and it is very hard to find a clean table , so unless you get your food to go expect to sit at a filthy table !!!

name: loretta jean
text: About 13 dollars for a very small bowl of chicken salad. I can make plenty more myself with that money. Overpriced! Quality was not worth the cost either…

name: Adrienne Magee
text: I really like this place. Great chicken salad. However, I've have been here twice and both times my order was incomplete. The first time it happened, I went back for my missing item. Today, when I got to work, I   realized two items were missing. I usually check to make sure I  have everything but today I forgot. (my bad) with that being said, I don't like paying for something and not getting it. I will be making my lunch from now on. Two stars for service.

name: Victor Johnson
text: Located in Saraland Alabama. Newly opened off of Hwy 158. The service was very good and the food as well. The prices are pretty fair

name: P. T.
text: The food has good taste. My issue is that I asked for a receipt but received a ticket instead that does not show I paid for the items I ordered. This also means I cannot receive the associated points. It is really annoying.

name: Katie Knapp
text: Placed a take out order online and picked up at a scheduled time. It was ready when I arrived, order was correct and food was delicious!

name: Dawn Beasley
text: This was my first visit. The variety is pretty impressive. If you can't find something on the menu, you're just trying to be difficult  ;-) The pina colada pie was a dream <3

name: Faithful J
text: Very nice place and the food is good. Love their lemonade too

name: Thomas Moynihan
text: Wonderful and quick bite, plenty of options and delightful service make this clean and healthier food place a great place to sit and eat.

name: Kelli Slay
text: Went to the Saraland chick and the food is always awesome at any location but today I ordered online and when received some of the items where missing and not the size that was paid for. These food places when being delivered need to start making sure food is correct at the ticket says or they don't need to have an online order or delivery set up.

name: lauren lee
text: wish i could give 0 stars. rude management and employees. they forgot one of my entire boxes of food, and was rude about it when i let them know. i see other reviews stating the same thing. not to mention there was flies all over the place, will not be returning!!

name: Debbie Mcgiboney
text: Food was great, service good, but the girl at the window had very long hair and it was loose and falling over the food and drinks before she put the lid on it

name: Rick Spurgeon
text: Great food, good variety but a little pricey

name: leanne marshall
text: waited in the drive thru for about 40 minutes and was given someone else’s order.

name: BamaMomma101
text: Food is delicious! However the drive thru was a 40 minute wait!

name: Tracy LePiane
text: Very friendly and helpful! Food was amazing!

name: Elizabeth Johnston
text: Delicious! Fast service, friendly people.

name: Love Angel94
text: Very friendly staff and awesome quality food!

name: Dawn Steadham
text: The food and service were really good, but I personally think the price is out of proportion for what you get. My 2 cents.

resp.text: Thank you Dawn! We appreciate your feedback! We hope we can get your review to a 5 star! Let us know if we can do anything for you :)

name: Angela Patteson
text: It's my favorite place to eat.

name: Katherine Ward
text: Delicious and great friendly service

name: Melda Tipp
text: Food was wonderful.

name: Mendy Leech
text: I found a fly in my food don't eat here!!!

name: April Waller
text: Great service , fast and great food!!!!

name: Barbara Able
text: Wow!!! The food is excellent!

name: Shanna Butler
text: Very good

name: Gary Petrie
text: Interesting flavors

name: connie markins
text: poor service and food was messy

name: Connie Benefield
text: Great service

name: Diane Noble
text: Fancy Nancy and cranberry Kelli salads were wonderful

name: daN Bob
text: literally was just there how many fries come with a chicken tenders meal?? because i count like 10 fries. this place was great when it first opened up but now its sucks for real! dont come to this one go to the one in warrior, its wayyy better.

name: Bill Allen
text: Fast food fast, not very personal at cash register. Talked to coworkers and not to customers. But food is good and fast.

name: Ben Perkins
text: Took a little longer than "fast food" should take because of our economical situation. Its hard to find staff right now due to the government assistance, however, staff that was present were working at fast paces. The food came out hot and juicy. Worth the wait, and the restaurant was VERY CLEAN.

name: James Nelson
text: The new Jack's in Morris has very good service and people.

name: Amelia Hicks
text:
Friendly staff, great service, and nice atmosphere!
Fast service as well! (:

name: Martha Ross
text: It wasn't Jacks,it was Subway! And got 2 subs to go for dinner. Very good and servers were very good and helpful.

name: Lisa Jett
text: Employees  very friendly. Fast and correct service. Food was hot and very good.

name: cora beth
text: They always keep the line moving quickly even when it's really busy! Kind staff

name: Lisa Evitts
text: The new location stays busy, but they move pretty quick. The food was hot , fresh and correct.

name: David Lee Broadhead
text: The best Jack's in the area, and there is literally one just off of every exit of I65 in Jefferson county, north of Birmingham. Haha.

name: JD
text: Worst food around. The 2 hamburger was dried out and not eatable. The few 12 fries was as bad and not eatable. Went thru drive thru Wednesday July 14 2021 at 4:48pm. Must be leftovers from lunch. General Manager Kolby Meaghan who is the name on the receipt should be fired for allowing the employees to be so non caring of customers and serving such garbage. We eat at Jack's in Warrior and Hayden and Mt. Olive all the time and this never happens. My second time at Morris and the same garbage both times , but never again. Shame on Jack's for allowing such incompetent staff to represent them.

name: Blake Barnwell
text: Food is good, as always! The drive-through service, can be at anytime be longer than 20 or 30 minutes. Speedy inside service. A sign on the door said today, “short staffed, drive-through only”.

resp.text: Thank you for being a fan, Blake. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience during your visit. We hope you'll be back again soon.

name: Jimmy Wesson
text: Really good service with smiling and friendly people. Food was good and hot.

name: Anita Williams
text: I come here a couple times a week to eat breakfast. Best breakfast around. The staff/ Jack's team are great people an Friends.

name: Kim Kinney
text: Fast and Always Friendly... not to mention delicious

name: Ed Harding
text: Pretty good fast foid.

name: Shawn Watson
text:
Food was good,
But there was alot of drama behind the counter,

name: Cheryl Mize
text: Nice, clean, only couple in the place for about 10min. This was a new Jack's.

name: Steve Hilton
text: Fast friendly service as always at this  location

name: Chris Jones
text: Don't go to drive thru you will sit there for a while before getting your order

name: Gerrie Higgins
text: Manager on duty was totally in charge every thing was smooth from ordering till you received your food In the past was a little shaky

name: Sheila Strickland
text: Great food and great service.

name: Bradie Lee
text: Very nice people

name: James Bentley
text: Jacks is always great

name: David Abraham
text: It's alright, expect it to be busy during busy hours, the way they built the drive through is just asking for traffic issues

name: Kelli Love

name: Patrice Johnson
text: It makes no sense how long the wait is on the inside and the drive thru. The line is always wrapped around the corner and it’s because they move so slow. It is ridiculous!

text: This is the second time in a week I got home and realized I did not have fries in the bag. How hard can it be?

resp.text: We sincerely apologize for leaving out your fries, Shawn. Please let our team know what's happened at tellittojacks.smg.com so we can work to fix this moving forward.

text: Love this Jack's location. New place in Livingston, Al. My partner at work and I have "sampled" every Jack's across the Blackbelt. We both agree, this is the best one. Stop here at least once a week

name: larryhyche
text: Just opened April 2021. The crew is learning the ropes as expected. So make sure they have your order right. But the food was great and they were very friendly!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and for your patience, Larry! We hope to see you again soon.

name: Cynthia Harris
text: Thank you, very fast through the drive  thru on this very sunny Friday afternoon. The two questions I have is the chocolates made with dark chocolate because they are not very sweet and the other question is, is there is someone with a heavy hand? Because the french fries were very salty.  You all have the very best BLT's. Thanks 😊

name: Kaisha Adams
text: Would have been a 5 star review if the manager actually followed corporate policy and wore a mask. However, the cashier and cooks were personable and friendly and I would highly recommend

resp.text: Kaisha, we take these concerns very seriously. Please share them with our team at tellittojacks.smg.com so we can look into it further.

name: Kathleen Hunt
text: My husband and I went in to place an order for a bacon and tomato sandwich, one scoop of vanilla and two scoops of chocolate. The drive thru line was wrapped around the building. Our order took 30 minutes! Shame on Jack's management for not preparing the people in this store! HORRIBLE service, too many employees tripping over each other!

resp.text: Kathleen, we sincerely apologize for your wait. Please let our team know at tellittojacks.smg.com.

name: Camille M
text: Food is good, every now and then they get my order wrong but most of the time they get it right.

name: Jim Ellis
text: Best fried chicken in town

name: DIABB Visions
text: Gave wrong order after getting home

name: Allan Schwindling
text: I made the mistake of stopping at the new Bojangles in Montgomery yesterday. First of all getting in and out of the parking lot is a nightmare. Turning left from Ann street is almost impossible. But that's not my major concern. During my wait in the drive thru I witnessed workers hanging out in the back corner of the parking lot. No big deal. Until one of the girls change a diaper on an infant and throws the used diaper over the fence. My point is, what does this say for a new restaurant. Having employees standing around and not even caring about this incident. Thanks but no thanks. Won't be spending my hard earned money there again.

name: Matthew Voke
text: Good food.

name: Mitch B
text: Typical Bojangles food and environment, but my experience was marred by poor service. On a Sunday lunch, the store was poorly staffed, the staff that was present seemed to be untrained by the poor service I received, and the food quality was lacking. If you are a Montgomery local, unless things change, visit the Eastchase location.

resp.text: Mitch, would mind sending us additional information on your visit to social@bojlangles.com?

name: AA Beauty
text: I give bojangles 5 stars. The chicken is always hot and fresh. Great spot to stop to eat while traveling.

name: Steven Penny
text: Apparently they were originally giving out incorrect size cups for the first few weeks so I was expecting a larger size when I placed an order tonight. Instead of just saying sorry for the confusion, offering me the medium cup or asking if I'd like to pay the difference, the male manager that took my order just acted like it was my problem. I was annoyed but I drove away and wanted to eat the Mac and cheese but they didn't give me any utensils(I was working) so I had to dig around my car and luckily I saved some plastic ones from another restaurant. I then tried to eat and there was a hair in my food. I went back received a refund and was told sorry by the cashier and possibly another manager that was around but the male manager that had to process the refund didn't have anything to say.....hair in the food and you couldn't say sorry for the inconvenience? Not anything major, just disgusting hair where it shouldn't belong and not very cheery attitude from the manager. I can get the same service from KFC if I wanted...which I don't and they've been around for years.

name: Chelsea Dodge
text: The girl that is working the register this evening was the most rude and ugly person. I ordered a drink with my salad and was giving attitude about it then no dressing no forks and she acted like it was above her to do her job. I won't be eating there for a while.

name: Shaun James
text:
I visited bojangles at about 8:40 pm on 1/7/2018 .
My experience with this reastaurant establishment was not a good one.I went through the drive through and waited about 10 mins before i received my food.I didn’t find out my order was incorrect until i got home.I had to ask for napkins and a fork.When i asked for hot sauce for my chicken they told me they was out .Who sales chicken without hot sauce? The 2 guys who worked the window was very rude..They act like i was bothering them for asking for things that was suppose to come with your meal.

resp.text: Shaun, we're very sorry to hear this. Can you please email the details to marketing@landonholdingsinc.com?

text: I just love their 8pc and 4 biscuits special on Wed for 5 bucks !!

resp.text: Terry, we are so glad that you enjoyed it!  Please tell everyone about us.

name: Shane McCloud
text: For the price they charge you for a meal... you don't get your money's worth. Don't go there hungry, because you will leave just as hungry and less wealthier.

text: I am normally very pleased.  But when I can't get thru on the phone to let the restaurant know I'm there for curbside pickup that's not okay!  (Voicemail box full). Please honor your curbside policy.

name: Ojas Gokhale
text:
Love this place. One of the newest chicken salads I have ever had. The croissant sandwich makes it even better.
I love their jalapeno holly spicy salad, it's shi good.
If you are not into spicy then you can't ho wrong with the classic carlo.
Service is prompt and fast and the outdoor seating is a good option.

name: Sandra White
text: Great service but the place needs cleaning especially the restrooms, my husband went to the restroom and one of the employees urinated all over the seat and left without flushing the toilet.

resp.text: Hi Sandra, we are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us. We would like to learn more about your visit with us. Will you please email us at Marketing@ChickenSaladChick.com?

name: Kalita Kennedy
text: The Dill-licious chicken salad is scrumptious! I love it! It needs to be a regular menu item.

resp.text: Hi Kalita, thank you for your feedback! We will certainly pass this along to our leadership team.

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text: Love this place, great for a light lunch

name: C Barnes
text: I'm a huge CSC fan!! It's always so quick, easy and yummy. They have so many chicken salad options to choose from so you won't have trouble finding the right kind for everyone. My personal favorite is the Fruity Fran! It had grapes and apples mixed into it. I always get one scoop of the Fruity Fran, with Mac & Cheese as my side and an extra pickle! Because one pickle spear is obviously not enough. Give it a try! Great for lunch.

name: Dale Burns
text: Excellent chicken salad! And being able to try the different varieties is a HUGE plus!

resp.text: Hi Dale, thank you so much for your positive comments about Chicken Salad Chick!

name: Mike Hill
text: This is a Great place. It's my Mom's favorite and my family's meeting place.for lunch.  Warning: the Dixie Chick is obnoxious ad advertised.  Otherwise, everything is Wonderful!!

name: Mary Crist
text: Food had good taste but portions could be a little larger for the price.  Broccoli salad needed a little more dressing.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Mary! We will certainly pass this along to our team.

resp.text: Hi Febra, we are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us. We would like to learn more about your visit with us. Will you please email us at Marketing@ChickenSaladChick.com?

text: Delicious!!! Lots of yummy choices and the girls working there are so sweet and helpful! We were in town a couple weeks ago and stopped by at least three different times as we just wanted some fresh yummy food that wouldn’t break the bank. Can’t wait to go back! ☺️

name: Michael Morrison
text: Maggie needs a promotion. Plain and simple. She is so friendly, kind, and fun. She radiates the energy that this company is going for. My friend and I came in expecting a nice dinner and ended up having an unforgettable time. Big thanks to her. Also try the jalapeno chicken salad 👍

resp.text: Mz Kathy, thank you so much for your high rating! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

name: Tristan
text: The chicken salad? Good stuff. The superstar staff member Maggie? Great stuff. Leaving this review before leaving the room because of how awesome Maggie was - she's out here putting smiles on faces everyday. She's 100% that chick.

name: janice wester
text: Love the Classic Carol!  Clean restaurant with all the necessary covid precautions. Employee was extra nice and helpful!

name: Zane Smith
text: Quick and efficient service! Christine and Riley did a fantastic job answering questions and getting my order straight. 2nd time ever to eat at Chicken Salad Chick. Will be returning soon. Recommend spicy chicken salad! 10/10

text: The food was amazing and the staff was so polite. Will definitely come back here again.

text: Best  chicken salad  ever .....

name: Saadiyah Smith
text:
Okay this place has awesome chicken salad the bread 🍞 is fantastic  the service was excellent omg the broccoli 🥦 salad was to die for I loved the clean area a small amount of diners covid friendly
This is my focus on all of my journaling now what places offer exceptional food and are covid compliant

name: Ashely Harrell
text: The group of young ladies at the front welcome you with a genuine smile and are very patient when trying to make a selection. Like always, meal was great!!!❤️

name: Heather Almiklafi
text: Nice and filled me up. The little cookie is delicious.

name: Anna Gleason
text: Honestly never had a bad customer service experience here, it’s just that the food itself is genuinely really bad. The pimento sandwich tastes like you’re eating giant chunks of pimento  straight from the bucket, except squished into a sandwich. It’s not a light gentle touch of pimento it’s this overwhelming unbearable chunky taste. I tried their salad on a different occasion hoping I’d have a better experience and it was just as disgusting. They don’t put anything good (I.e. croutons, onions, cheese, etc) on their salads, just the basics making it very bland. The aesthetic of the whole restaurant is very throw-up colored and looks like an old lady’s house. I’ve noticed a lot of the customers tend to be old too...just not my place! But never bad customer service, just bad food.

name: dawn lawson
text: I should of stayed with the chicken salad, I went with the pimiento salad and the pasta salad  bad choice.

resp.text: Hi Dawn Lawson, we regret your most recent visit with us was not up to the standards we strive for. We hope you are willing to give us another chance. Please reach out to us at (205) 995-2525 so we can work towards a resolution. We are looking forward to hearing from you!

name: lydia thompson
text: I placed a catering order for my office for lunch. Christina and her team made the process so easy. To my surprise, I pulled up in the parking space, waved, and she knew me by name. She brought out the order immediately and even included extra goodies when she found out we were a dental office seeing patients with urgent dental needs 7 days a week. I can't say enough great things about this team. Our order was correct, packaged carefully and thoughtfully. Our doctor was glad to support a local business! Thanks, again, CSC Lee Branch!

name: Brett Minter
text: I love Chicken Salad Chick. They have a type or two of Chicken Salad that anyone can love. Such good options. Their grape salad is out of this world good as well. This particular location has always been good and the service is always prompt and courteous. I work close by and get lunch to go often and rarely have to wait more than about 5 minutes. I will definitely keep going back.

resp.text: Hi Brett! Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so glad you enjoyed your experience at Chicken Salad Chick and that you love our grape salad! We can't wait to see you again very soon! We hope you have a fantastic day!

name: Jonathan Wood
text: Friendly staff, great food, reasonabke prices

resp.text: Hi Jonathan, thank you so much for your positive comments about Chicken Salad Chick! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

name: Emma Solis
text: Clean restaurant, friendly staff, awesome food. First timer and I am officially a customer for life. That grape salad and Lauryns Basil won me over.

resp.text: Hi Emma, thank you so much for your positive comments about Chicken Salad Chick! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us! We can't wait to see you again!

name: Misty Butler
text: Food and service were both great..my first time here

text: Excellent food, great prices. My lunch was amazing!!! Fantastic place and very friendly staff!!

text: Love all their varieties of a chicken salad. My favorite side is the broccoli salad.  Lots of great, healthy choices.

resp.text: Teresal, we are so happy to read such a great review about Chicken Salad Chick! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

name: Kristi Pruitt
text: I love chicken salad to start with - so this place is a mecca to me. I have my favorites of Cranberry Kelli, Fancy Nancy, the pimento cheese, Fruity Fran, the grape salad.... My all time favorite is the seasonable flavor "Rockin Rita" which is supposed to be coming out again November 1st. This flavor it the best for a football tailgate with frito scoops, but we also buy the to go pounds as well. :)

name: Mrs T
text: Delicious as always

resp.text: Hi there, we really appreciate your positive review!

name: James S
text: Really enjoy the food - though, as some have mentioned, it is wall-to-wall chicken salad - but the service was what really surprised me. A notably uninterested fellow took my order, then I took my place in a surprisingly long line for how slow business was. Took 15 minutes to scoop my pre-made salad into a container with some club cracker 2-packs, and naturally no mention was made of the wait when it was handed over.

name: Gwen Sanderson
text: Awesome lunch?!

name: Steven Eversole
text: It's chicken salad, and it's good.  They have every chicken salad you could possibly want.  Downside is that it's only chicken salad.  Not much else of anything on the menu.  Most kids will not enjoy this place.  Mine hate it.  My wife and I like the chicken salad variety.  Again, it's Chicken Salad.

resp.text: Hey Steven! Thank you for taking the time to give us your review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: sharon hardy

resp.text: Sharon, we are so happy to read such a great review about Chicken Salad Chick! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

It was less than good. Slow delivery of food to the table. Salad was average but nothing I'd brag about. I'd heard so much about it but was sorely disappointed.  I will not be back.

My chicken salad gets an A+ compared to theirs. Just saying.

resp.text: We are so sorry you did not enjoy your experience at Chicken Salad Chick. We serve 12 different flavors of chicken salad, so there is something for everyone. We hope you will come back and try something different that you might enjoy! Have a great day!

name: Mike Hiatt
text: The food was okay, but kinda pricey. Hardly got any crackers with our meal. Asked for extra crackers with one meal and got none. I ordered three scoops on another meal and only got six packs. That is only enough for one scoop. Definitely a disappointment, will probably not go back.

name: Julia Thomason at Love the Mouse Travel
text: This is my favorite place to get chicken Salad. I usually stop there a couple of times a week to get some Dixie Chick chicken Salad out of there grab and go case. The staff is always friendly and the store is always clean. They have an amazing variety of different types of chicken salad. Their pimento cheese is also really good. They also do catering. It's just a great place....love it!!

name: Pam Murphree
text: Used to love this place and thought  I was eating good healthy food and eat here often . Then I read the fat content. Wish they would make some low fat, and mayo free options.

name: Derrick Hardy

resp.text: Derrick, thank you so much for the positive review! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

resp.text: Hey Allan! Thank you so much for your positive review! We can't wait to see you again! Have a great day!

name: Erin Belk
text: Chicken Salad Chick is a great place to grab lunch or a quick bite. This location is always very clean, the food comes out quickly and tastes delicious, and the staff is very friendly.

name: Steven Mooney
text: It's pretty neat.  They have a ton of different chicken salad flavors and all the ones I've tried have been really good.  It's super crowded at lunch, so don't go if you're in a hurry.  The service is pretty good, though, and the staff is friendly.  The decor inside is terrible.  It's like a caricature of an old southern house.  Just horrible to look at, in my opinion, but I'm sure a lot of people here like it.  Get it to go, so you can enjoy the good food without the crowd.

name: Kel Kel
text: Super fast and friendly service!!! My favorite chicken salad is the kickin Kay Lynne, the grape salad is great too!  Love this place.

name: Bill Tiemann

text: I got the cheeseburger an it was literally the best! It was crunchy, warm, delicious! My friend got the macaroni and cheese and she said that it was super warm and super fresh and we would love to come back and try something different!

text: Great place to eat and shop service was excellent and great food also very enjoyable experience with my grandson

name: Debra Thorstenson
text: Service was good, food was delicious today.  I had home style chicken which was 2 pieces of batter fried chicken breast, mashed potatoes and baby carrots. My sis had chicken fried chicken with mashed potatoes and pinto beans. We had biscuits with our meal and they were good.

name: Linda Ledlow
text: Our family's favorite place to meet and share a meal. Recent visit was the first time we'd been out in more than a year, thanks to the coronavirus. The service at Cracker Barrel was great, food was excellent, no waiting, we sure love our Cracker Barrel! ❤️

name: Karen Griffin
text: The food was awesome and the Service was equally good. Blessings continually on this business 💙💛

name: Christmas Clark
text: I got the Cracker Barrel Country Boy's breakfast I think that's what they call it. Everything was good except for the grits and that was runny. It was priced reasonably too.

name: Chelsea “ChelseaMae” Sutton
text: Customer service was excellent! Country boys platter was amazing and the soft fresh biscuits and delicious gravy was so good. So good!! Coffee was also yummy! Mallow cup chocolates were in the gift shop which in Missouri are almost impossible to find other than a 5 below. Thanks guys!!! So goood!!

name: Tim Smith
text: I love this place but the prices are steadily increasing. They do their best to keep social distancing. These are front-line workers and we appreciate them to the highest degree. Everything is clean and there was a nice fire going on a cold snowy day. They've changed the chicken fried chicken and you now get two fillets that are small and they taste a bit different and we were not informed about that before we ordered them. Overall our experience with swell and I give this place pop stars. Forgive the typos I'm using speech to text

name: Wade Hendrix
text: I love Cracker Barrel but the one in Florence, Alabama is not very good. The baked potatoes are very bad. They're not prepared properly. The food in general is just not up to the level it should be and not like it is at any other location I've been to.Like many other reviews I've read, the food is delivered cold. I urge them to try harder because we'd love to come often.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Wade. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Holly Smith
text: Short wait for lunch.  Good service and the food was hot and well cooked. Abe was our server.

name: Nancy Butler
text: Charles was our server this evening. He did an excellent job! The food was wonderful ! I have the chicken pot pie And I would highly recommend! It was a little bit cold in the corner of the restaurant where we sat. That is the only complaint that I could say. Everything else was wonderful!

name: Helen Jeffreys
text: I went to Cracker Barrel with 2 friends our food was cold I sent mine back got same thing it was chicken fingers I was afraid to eat. One friend ordered  A steak rare it was about burned she left it on table I ate baked potato and water the waiter was great we took good care of him  and paid for food we could not eat so dissipointed  we are all on fixed income and was enjoying out day out after being quarantined so long.  So sad

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Helen. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? name: Corliss Fletcher
text: My daughter in law says Cracker Barrel is like kryptonite for me. It really is, and I love to wade through all they have to sell  food is always good too. My son tried the country fried turkey and really liked it. His wife got chicken and dumplings. I ordered meatloaf and got this huge piece that was enough for the cats to have some. Cracker Barrel was extremely popular with the cats. People who work there are always nice and it was a very pleasant dinner.

name: TC Gurus
text: It's a Cracker Barrel. Our server AJ was excellent. He is the reason that I'm leaving this review and he adds two stars to this overall rating. The food was hot and quickly brought out on a busy Sunday. The hot coffees were  much sweeter than we had anticipated but had a strong coffee flavor to them. They got better as we added more hot coffee to our cups. 🙂 We love visiting Florence and would recommend this location to anyone in this area. Especially if you are lucky enough to get AJ.

name: Wade Harrison
text: They were short handed on waitresses ours was stressed out. Waited eight minutes on drink refills. Asked for napkins three times before they were brought.  Asked for tarter sauce twice. Drinks finally came tea was wrong(sweet). Food was cold before we could finish meal. We were in a good mood. I told waitress to relax and have a Merry Christmas. You do the same.

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear about the poor experience, Wade. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better. Thank you.

name: rebecca delorme
text: Waited 25 min for called in order. Got it finally, this was the chef salad. No ham, croutons. Salad dressing or fork.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Rebecca. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

text: I dropped my wallet in restroom and didn't realize it.. a cpl minutes later an employee handed it to me....very cool

name: Jim Turner
text: Great country foods and great service!! Love the Ole time Cracker Barrel Restraunt!! Need another Cracker Barrel in Petersville, Al.

name: Stuart Roper
text: Foods fine unfortunately the lady doing the carryout and curbside does not answer the phone. I called four times and eventually gave up. Went inside only to be treated rude by the person who don't answer the phone. Unprofessional representation of an otherwise good restuarant.  The order is easily looked up. Its under my name.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Stuart. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? text: Absolutely a magnificent place to eat! The food is delicious & the staff is awesome.  My favorite place.  Has been for years.

name: Sara Phillips
text: As always a great place to eat and a fun little gift shop to browse.

name: Stuart Roper
text: Follow up on my last review. First of all it was about service not food quality. And Cracker Barrel responds sounding concerned. But even though I left a phone number and all info required and waited a week. Guess what? They only do that to appear like the problem is resolved. Rather than having their employees answer the phone for curb side service. Forcing us to come inside anyway. Well your food is average at best and no longer required at my household.

name: Joni Nobles
text:
Cracker Barrel in Conyers was busy but all stations were open. Food was excellent
Very clean.

name: Garret Cox
text: Went in just for the new butter crunch latte. Service was fast and the drink was delicious

name: Allison montgomery
text:
This was the worst experience I've ever had at a cracker barrel. What's worse than bad service is no service!!
Another waitress took our drink and food order not to mention her section was clear across the restaurant. The busser was bussing a table with guests still sitting at it. My husbands food wasn't cook thoroughly and our waitress never introduced herself to let us know she was our server until after our food came out in which she didn't even bring! I'm a server myself. I know how it is to be in the weeds. She however wasn't considering she was bussing other tables.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Allison. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

text: Used to be a good place to eat...but we called in our order for pickup and I ordered deep fried shrimp w fries and it made me so sick bc the shrimp tasted like it was old the steak fries definitely came out of a bag from the freezer ( the kind you get from the grocery store) ...my husband said never again!!!

resp.text: Hi Debbie. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us. Thank you.

name: Curtis Cox
text: When I first got my food the beans looked old. Waitress said my cornbread would be about 5 minutes. I said ok. Twenty minutes later, I'm done with my meal, still no cornbread. Manager maid no effort to compensate for their poor service. Would give no stars if it would let me.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Curtis. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? name: Beverely Nichols
text: Ordered the open face roast beef with creamed potatoes, coleslaw.  When it arrived at table it was cold and the side order of coleslaw was in a small round plastic to go cup like the one they use to bring you extra salad dressing in.  I don't seem to have any luck ordering this meal, it never even remotely looks like the photo they advertise.

resp.text: Hi Beverely - Sorry to disappoint. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us. Thank you.

name: Rick Hogue
text: Food was good and fairly quick from the kitchen.  Service was also pretty good.   Check out was IMPOSSIBLE. Don't know what Cracker Barrel can't figure out about taking money,  but this is a universal problem at every one of their stores I have been in for several years.

name: Henry Tidwell
text: We had a very good time . It was 7 of us and celebrated  4 siblings  birthdays  . Our waitress  was good to tolerate  our craziness.

name: Trevor Tumlin
text: Great food, good service and I was able to buy my daughters pageant dress here too!!

name: Kevin Emerson
text: Always great food here. Service is also good

name: Pat Parsons
text: Great selection in the store and really great sale on wood wick candles

name: Allen smith
text: The food was amazing and the service was good. I highly recommend for anyone who enjoy country style breakfast or lunch.

name: Renee Lisby
text: I like that it reminds me of home, it's home cooked food without all of the mess. The shop is great I like finding things that are a blast from the past.

name: Kennedy English
text: This establishment has the honor of being one of the top ten WORST experiences I've ever had in my life! Not only were the staff uninformed of dietary differentiations, but I was told but the server the cook said that "eggs werent vegetarian" after I ordered and asked if the buscuits contained lard or other animal fat. I'm already irritated at this point and then she informs me that the buscuits also are not vegetarian safe because they contain eggs! When I asked to speak to the manager (thinking surely she would be more informed on the subject) the server was sent back with a chart of common allergens! I had enough at that point and asked to speak with the store manager concerning my allergies and dietary needs. The manager never arrived. After several minutes we decided to just eat elsewhere. Cracker barrel you should be very ashamed of your employees lack of knowledge on such a common dietary need.

name: Richard Brewer
text: Cracker Barrel has the best breakfast! Especially this location in Florence,  AL! Most of the time it's very quick service. I normally get the Smokehouse breakfast that comes with eggs(the way you like- over medium for me or scrambled with colby cheese), choice of bacon or sausage(bacon for me), sawmill gravy and biscuits,  and grits(I put butter and sugar in mine) and I normally ask for apple butter and an extra biscuit(at no extra charge). Sometimes I get Mommas pancakes or French toast. Usually get a large chocolate milk(purity). It's all so good. I love the ample amount of antique decor all around to reminisce. The fireplace is neat in the winter.

name: PrettyPinkClouds311
text: Great food small high price.. And cheap items and cute seasonal things

name: Mickel Rogers
text: Excellent food and great service and also shopping services

name: B Tanner
text: First off, Abe was an amazing waiter! Today was actually my birthday and Kevin the manager tried to ruin it. We asked to be moved after being sat by the emergency exit that they were using to serve outdoor dining and the door was continually opened and so flies were all at our table. We asked Kevin for a different table and he said in an agitated tone, “it’ll be awhile.” He offered no other solution and a table across from us was just cleared and when we asked about it he said that he didn’t have a table for us! I was so disappointed as we had a $100 ticket easily but he didn’t care at all!

name: Chuck Bermele
text: Not happy with the meal.  I went there for a late lunch and my regular favorite, meat loaf. The mash potatoes looked and tasted like they were barely warmed over leftovers and were a solid chunk. The meat loaf was less than the size I'm usually served and looked a small hamburger patty mashed into the shape of a very thin cut of meat loaf with catsup poured over it. It was also barely warm. I won't be back...

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Chuck. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better.

text: What can you say, it is cracker barrel.   Always busy but worth the wait.   The only downside for me is that the hot chocolate isn't hot and isn't milk chocolate so slightly bitter. Will I go back?  Of course,  it is cracker barrel!

name: Ashley Beavers
text: Waited 15 minutes after being seated, waved down the hostess to get a waitress. Put in our order. A table of 3 sits down before the waitress comes, they get a drink order. Another table of 6 sits down,they get their drink order. 20 minutes goes by and now the table of 3 and the table of 6 have their food and we have yet to see a waitress again. Will not be back. This is the second time in 3 weeks that the service has been HORRIBLE!!!! Corporate needs to come in to do an evaluation.

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear about the poor service, Ashley. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please include your phone number and email address, the location you visited, and any other details that could help us understand the situation better. We'd love to make it right.

name: Terry Swithin
text: Great Quick Service , great food , and you just can't beat the prices. A +

name: James Medders
text: Fried chicken the bomb hit the spot

name: Jesse Ortiz
text: Be prepared to come here and get full. I've never been to a Cracker Barrel before, but I really enjoyed this place. The service was great and food was nice. I got a "Grandma's Sampler," and I struggled to finish it, as much as I wanted to.

name: Donnie Smith
text: Food not like it was years ago, so-so.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Donnie. Can you please email us some additional information at customercare@crackerbarrel.com? Please use your review username as your subject line, and include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any additional information you’d like to share with us.

name: Alicia Shelton
text: Food was great and service was excellent. Very friendly staff.

name: John Lard
text: Have breakfast for dinner. The food was really good but it was kind of cold in there.  Wife went and stood by the fireplace.

name: Peggy Borden
text: The food is always delicous

name: Kayla Cummings
text: I love this store! The customer service is impeccable & it's quick amazing food!

name: Ronald Thurston
text: Food was amazing but the service was out of this world! Staci was our waitress and I can say enough great things about her! Attentive, quick, great memory to make sure our meal was correct, got my lemon on the side for my water which is rarely remembered when I order it that way (I don't like lemon seeds in my water). Very impressed!

name: Daryel Rogers
text: Some of Mine and Wife food was Cold, had to be taken Back!!!

name: Nancy Smith
text: Bad experience. Waited 35 minutes for our food while watching others that came in after us get their food. We paid for our drinks and left

name: Nancy Davis
text: Waitress super. Found spinach in mashed potatoes. Brown gravey way to salty. Fried chicken breasts way way to much pepper that burned my mouth. You should leave the salt and pepper up to the customer because I do know someone who is allergic  to pepper. I had no choice but to take the breading off the chicken! I could not believe how much pepper was in the batter. The ice tea was good. I was not charged for the meal but it was very disappointing I could not enjoy my meal.

resp.text: We're truly sorry to hear we didn't get it right this time around, Nancy. Can you please email us some additional information at SocialMediaAdmin@crackerbarrel.com? Please include: phone number, email address, store location, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better. We'd love the chance to make it right.

name: Faith
text: Good as always and I love all the holiday items they have for sale. Husbands favorite is the new pumpkin almonds!

name: David Wallin
text: If you're ordering curbside you may want to rethink it. I sat for over 30 minutes waiting with my 18mo daughter. Still had to go inside and collect my food which was sitting on the shelf. Sorry, but that's not how curbside delivery works.

name: Trish
text: We were seated quickly, and our server was friendly and stayed on top of everything.

text: Loved this place , enjoyed the food here , loved the biscuits , loved the vintage value !

name: Trish
text: We were seated quickly, and our server was friendly and stayed on top of everything.

name: Susan Strickland
text:
Cracker Barrel is such a unique place to experience!
The food, the atmosphere & the great food all make a lasting memory.

name: Kelsey Brand
text: They treat Doordashers terribly here. The only thing they serve well is attitude. I’ve spoken with several Dashers about this and the consensus is that CB sucks, and it’s not worth picking up orders from here.

name: Meletha Payton
text: My husband and I east at Cracker Barrel once a month or more at the Florence, AL location. On Friday 8-7-20, we came in and was seated quickly, the waiter was nice and made sure we were checked on several times. The biggest complaint we have was our food. My chicken strip were still raw, (thank you for bringing back the steak fries) & they did not have my Honey French Dip anymore. My husband had chicken and dumplings and steak and gravy. My husband had 3 bowls of dumplings with no chicken, his steak was too tuff to eat. We brought our food home to give to our dogs. I tried to tell the guy at checkout that our meal was awful but I guess he didn't care.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about the poor experience, Meletha. Can you please email us some additional information at SocialMediaAdmin@crackerbarrel.com? Please include: your phone number and email address, location you visited, as well as any other relevant information that could help us understand the situation better.
